1b1: a kha khrig 'jig rten 'a khab ga
1b2: bu med pa dag na/ dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
1b3: s ems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa rab 'byam ma lus pa'i dkon mchog thams cad la gus par
1b4: phyag 'tshal lo/ / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs kyi
1b5: sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / lho phyogs kyi
1b6: sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / nub phyogs kyi
1b7: sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang phyogs kyi sangs
1b8: rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang shar mtshams kyi sangs

2a1: rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / shar lho mtshams kyi sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
2a2: lho nub mtshams kyi sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nub byang mtshams kyi sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs
2a3: pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bla ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
2a4: 'tshal lo/ / yang shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
2a5: nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas
2a6: dpa' brtan pa'i sde dga' ba'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas tshe mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin
2a7: gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas sman gyi bla be DU r+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas sa la'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin
2a8: gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin po che'i dpal gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//

2b1: sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas uta pa la rgyas pa bsrang gi rgyal
2b2: po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi ldog pa'i
2b3: 'khor lo sgrogs pa'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas rab tu gdon mi za ba pad mo rgyas pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul med pa'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas seng ge de bzhin gshegs
2b4: pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / rab tu snang ba'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas rin po che'i gtsug phud de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od bzang po'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad
2b5: de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'da' bar dka' ba'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer rab tu rgyas pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rab tu bzang po'i 'jig rten
2b6: na/ sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i blo gros 'od zer gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// me long gi dkyil 'khor bsgrags pa'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas zla ba'i thugs de bzhin
2b7: gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / pad mo dpal gyi 'jig rtenan/ sangs rgyas dpal bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas zla 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la
2b8: phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas mdzes chen de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs

3a1: rgyas dga' ba'i spyan de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser gyi bzu ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
3a2: 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i yon tan gyi 'od zer de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas smon lam thams cad las 'byung ba'i rin po che'i gzi brjid shin tu 'phags pa'i
3a3: rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas grags pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas ye shes rdo rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs
3a4: pal phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gtsug tor can de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i dbang po
3a5: bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas log par dang sal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gsang thub de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'od srung na
3a6: bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// mabyon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la byug
3a7: 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa'arnam par snang mad chen pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs kyis chos kyi sgyum mdapal phyag 'tshal la// 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa
3a8: dragazugs thams cad la byug 'tshal la/ / nges thal thams cad la phyag 'artsal mo// sa cad can thams cad la byug lalo// dam pa rtsos pad rnas byag laso// rgyas kyis bsgru

3b1: sdel phyag 'tshal lo/ / lung du bstan pa'i sngal phyag 'tshal lo// tshigs su bcad pa'i sngal phyag 'tshal lo// che dku brjod pa'i sbal phyag 'tshal lo// glang gzhi'i snrel phyag 'tshal lo// rtogs pa brjod pa
3b2: sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'das pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// skyes pa rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu rgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// mad du byung ba'i sdel phyag 'tshal lo// chos rtogs pa brtan
3b3: pa'i sdel phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod theg pa chen po'i mdzod thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi gsung rab thams cad dang / 'dul ba thabs kyi sgom ma lus pa
3b4: thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / chos kyi dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' brjod du med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te/ dam pa'i chos
3b5: kyi yi ge thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs//
3b6: kyi byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo// nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bas byin la phyag 'tshal
3b7: lo/ / byang shar mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// shar lho mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' lag na pad me la phyag 'tshal lo// lho nub mtshams
3b8: kyi byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ / nub byang mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// 'og gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' pad mo dam pa la phyag

4a1: 'tshal lo/ / tha ma rdzogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas byin la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phrug la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' byas sa/
4a2: pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo//
4a3: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems
4a4: dpa' dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
4a5: shes rab chen po'i mchog 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i mchog 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo// mang du thos pa'i mchog 'phags pa kun dga' bo la phyag 'tshal
4a6: lo/ / spangs pa'i yon tan gyi mchog 'phags pa 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo// bslab pa la gus pa'i mchog 'phags pa nor sbyin 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog 'phags pa nye bar 'khor la
4a7: phyag 'tshal lo/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan mnga' ba'i mchog 'phags pa ma 'gags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dri zhing lan ldon pa'i mchog 'phags pa rab 'byor la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i dge 'dun
4a8: thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la dad pas phyag 'tshal nas/

4b1: sdig pa kun byang dge tshogs rnam par 'phel// bcom ldan so so'i bkar las ci 'byung ba// yon tan khyad par can de grub par shog/ phyogs bcu'i dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bstod cing bsngags so//
4b2: blta zhing brtag go/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams rab 'byam las 'byung ba ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs mchog/ gtso bo/ dam pa/ khyad par can/ bzang po/ gya nom pa/ bla na med pa/ mi mnyan
4b3: pa dang mnyam pas phyogs bcu'i snod kyi 'jig rten thur bur bkang ste/ chos kyi mchod pa dang bcas pas ma lus me lus lus pa med pa'i dkon mchog gsum la phyi ma'i mu'i mthar rtag tu rlan mi 'chad par mchod
4b4: cing 'don to/ / dbul zhing gsol lo// bkur stir bgyi'o// bla mar bgyi'o// ri mor bgyi'o// mnyes par bgyi'o// bdag cag gi skye ba 'di dang thog ma dang mtha' ma ma mchis pa nas srid pa gsum gyi 'khor ba na 'khor
4b5: zhing 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gsum gyi dbang gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sgo nas mi dge bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs te/ gsung rab kun las 'gal ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag gis
4b6: ci bgyis pa dang / gzhan la bcol ba dang / gzhan bgyi dpal rjes su yi rang ba de dag rdul tsam pag tsam yang ma lus par mthol zhing bshags so// sbyangs zhing bslad do// gzhig cing gdon to// mi 'chab po/ mi srid
4b7: do/ / mi bsnyen mi bgyid do// de nas de'i tshe sdig pa thams cad ni byang / bsod nams thams cad ni rdzogs te/ dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ dgongs pa'i dbang gis ched tu sprul pa ma gtogs
4b8: par nam nam zhar zhar tshe tshe rabs rabs su/ / ngan song gsum la sogs te/ bgegs rigs thams cad du mi skye mi ltung bar shog shig/ log pa mi dge ba la mi phyogs par shog shig/ las dang nyon mongs

5a1: ba'i rgyal mi phyogs mi bgyid par shog shig/ spad pa'i lus dang sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu kun las thar nas mi myong bar shog shig/ dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du sgo gsum
5a2: nas dge ba chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du rgyun mi 'chad par shog shig/ tshe rabs gar skyes kyang bde skyed phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te/ sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba la mthu dang dbang yod par shog shig/ gang de
5a3: bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gi thugs su chud pa'i chos bla na med pa'i byang chub tu gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya ba'i don de kho na nyid gang yin pa de ba dag gis kyang ma nor bar khong du chud cing sgom la/ gzhan
5a4: dag la yang ma nor bar ston cing 'dren par shog shig/ dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi ste/ bdag nyid lus dbul gyis thugs rje chen po ldan pa
5a5: rnams kyis so so nas rtag tu bzhes shig/ ji ltar na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' yod pa thams cad dang bral ba/ dngos po dang / sems dang / skye mched kyis ma zin pa'i chos bdag
5a6: med pa dang mnyam pa/ thog ma nas ma skyes pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ltar bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang / dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du byang chub
5a7: tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ / byang chub kyi sems ni nam gzhar yang mi stong zhing bshes gnyen dam pa de dang nam yang mi 'bral bar shog shig/ ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas de dag bla na med pa'i bsod
5a8: nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba ltar/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo // nam 'chi bar nges pa'i dus de na sangs rgyas dang /

5b1: byang chub sems dpa'i zhal mngon sum du mthong nas/ phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ bdag gi spyi bor bzhag nas lung nod par gyur cig/ bdag gis kyang nyon mongs pas sems mi 'khrul bar chos
5b2: bdag med pa dang 'thun pa'i 'dun pa can dang / byang chub kyi sems tshad med pa dang ldan bzhin du 'chi ba'i dras byed par shog shig/ mdor na bag chags ma lus kun byang nas// bsod nams ye shes tshogs
5b3: gnyis yongs rdzogs te/ / 'gro ba ma lus byin gyis bsgral ba'i phyir// bdag nyid myur du mngon par sangs rgyas shog/ dbang skor phyag brgya pa rdzogs s+ho//
5b4: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a tsin t+ya rA dzA sU tra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams/
5b5: cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na chos kyi dbye kon pa na/ byang chub kyi snying po na seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang nor bu rin po ches spras pa'i pad ma'i snying pon
5b6: gdan la bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi rdul phra rab snyid kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems
5b7: dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la smras pa/
5b8: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bskal pa gcig gang

6a1: yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zheng bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ / kye rgyal ba'i
6a2: t has dag bzhin gshegs padagra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs kyis chod dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'a bde ba can gyi 'dig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa do ni bzhin
6a3: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'jom pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
6a4: n ga'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'jom pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer shin tu stug po pad ma rab tu rgyas
6a5: pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer shin tu stug po pad ma rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs
6a6: rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
6a7: d e bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
6a8: pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa

6b1: gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
6b2: b com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer
6b3: me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i
6b4: sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 'od zer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ kye
6b5: r gyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 'od zer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
6b6: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i blo gros kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ltar bskal pa bgrang ba'i thabs 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis brtsis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
6b7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa'i tha ma 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
6b8: pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba bzang po'i dpal bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig ko/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan

7a1: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis thos par 'gyur
7a2: gyi/ / gzhan dag gis ni thos par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i
7a3: 'khor de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten ye rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
7a4: chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal pos gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// /
7a5: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya da sha dig a na d+ha kA ra bi d+ha na sa na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
7a6: dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang na/ ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyes brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong
7a7: gi dge 'dun chen po dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs gsol nas/ snyun bzed dang
7a8: chos gos man pas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du ba dang nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la gshegs so// de'i tshen

7b1: kya gzhan nu bzhin rab gas la zhes bya ba zhi ba nga gag sung shang rta la zhon nas sar skya'i gnas grong ltar can po nas byer byung ba dang / shakyagazhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis// bcom ldan 'das thag
7b2: khon nas gshegs pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang shing rta las babs nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das
7b3: kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la shAkya gzhon nu bzhin
7b4: rab gsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag gi pha ma gnyis gnyid log pa dang ma log pa dag la mi ma lags pa rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid la/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang gang gi
7b5: tshe ljongs kyi phyogs gzhan du mchi ba'i tshe/ bdag la yang chom rkun pa dag rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid cing / gcan zan dag kyang rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid na// de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
7b6: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du ci nas kyang bdag la mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gra togs pa 'ga' yang rnam par 'tshe bar
7b7: mi bgyid pa de ltar bdag la legs par bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/ bsrung ba'i cho ga yang bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal la 'di skad
7b8: ces bka' stsal to/ / gzhon nu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal bcom

8a1: ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi kham
8a2: nyon mongs pa thams cad bskyod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes spyod ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so// gzhon nu
8a3: khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shar phyogs su 'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing song na khyod
8a4: la 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe ma g.yengs par de yid la byas na khyod la bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
8a5: bka' stsal to/ / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thub pa che// rje la rab tu phyag 'tshal te// rtag tu de ni mngon byed cing // 'gron khyod la 'jigs mi 'byung // gzhon nu lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
8a6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa dang mun nag gi tshogs bcom zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems
8a7: dang po bskyed pa yid la mdzad pa rnam grangs bsnyengs pa dang bag tsha ba dang bral bas mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ / gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir
8a8: lho phyogs su 'gro na/ / de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing / khyim la sogs pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnam

8b1: par ma g.yengs pa yid la byed pas song na/ khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
8b2: pa 'di bka' stsal to/ / khyim gyi bsam pa rnams dang ni// kun nas ldang ba kun bral zhing // lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur// gzhon nu nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
8b3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yul phebs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kho na dang rgyags
8b4: pa rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ / gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir nub phyogs su 'gro na de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te/ dran par
8b5: byas shing mdun du byas nas sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing zag pa med pa rnam par ma g.yengs pa dang dran pas khyod song na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan
8b6: 'das kyis de'i'atshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ / chos 'ga' skyes pa yod min zhing // 'ga' yang 'gag par mi 'gyur te// gang gis chos rnams de ltar shes// de la 'jigs pa ci yang med// gzhon
8b7: nu byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
8b8: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gzugs bkod 'od gnon zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing ga zhes so/ / gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir byang phyogs su 'gro na/

9a1: de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma g.yengs par yid la byed pas song na/ khyod bya ba gang
9a2: gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// rtag tu sems can thams cad la//
9a3: mnyam pa nyid la sems byos la// sems can de lam brnyes dang // khyod la 'jigs pa 'gyur mi 'gyur// gzhon nu byang shar gyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri 'das pa
9a4: na 'jig rten gyi khams bdud kyi sde bcom pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud dang yid gnyis kun 'joms rnams gnon zhes bya ba da
9a5: ltar bzhags te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha ji snyed yod pa de dag thams
9a6: cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par mdzad de/ gzhon nu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa'i skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu byung ba yin no// gzhon nu khyod
9a7: gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir byang shar gyi phyogs su 'gro na de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas de/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma
9a8: g.yengs pas song na khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// /

9b1: gang gis gang gis dang po'i thugs kyis ni// bdud rnams pa ma mdzad sangs rgyas de// dran bzhin du ni khyod song na// khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur// gzhon nu shar lho'i phyog ma logs mu sangs rgyas kyi
9b2: zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyed
9b3: pas phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes so/ / gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa des dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar du bar chad
9b4: med par sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa kun tu bsten/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan bsgrubs/ shes rab spyad de/ gzhon nu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de'i skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu byung ba yin no// /
9b5: gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shar lho'i phyogs su 'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te/ phyis khyim nas song shig dang / khyod la phyis 'gyod pa'am 'jigs
9b6: pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rnam par ma g.yengs pas yid la byed na/ khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka'
9b7: stsal to/ / yan lag lngas ni phyag 'tshal te// phyi nas khyim nas song shig dang // chom rkun rnams kyis khyod kun du// zil gyis mi non 'gro bar 'gyur// gzhon nu lhonab kyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi
9b8: zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin

10a1: chen gdugs 'phags snang zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ / gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir lho nub kyi phyogs su 'gro na de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag
10a2: 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma g.yengs pa'i yid la byed pas song na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro/
10a3: ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// me tog sil mas gtor cig dang // khyod ni lho nub 'gro
10a4: ba na/ / 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhon nu nub byang gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs dag
10a5: rab gnas mngon par 'phags shes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'dul zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
10a6: so/ / gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni mi gtsang ba med pa/ 'khrig pa med pa/ bud med med pa/ tsher ma dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med pa/ snyigs ma lnga med pa yin no// gzhon nu
10a7: khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir nub byang gi phyogs su 'gro na tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par blangs nas phyis khyim nas rnam par ma g.yengs pa'i yid la byed pas song shig dang / gzhon nu khyod bya
10a8: ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// tshangs spyod yang

10b1: ngag blangs byas te/ / phyi nas khyim nas song shig dang // khyod ni gang dang gar 'gro yang // chom rkun rnams kyis zil mi non// gzhon nu steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung /
10b2: drug cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jigs rten gyi khams dmigs pa med pa yid la byed pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skrag med
10b3: mun bral ting nge 'dzin mngon 'phags rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ / gzhon nu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te 'dug kyang rung / 'greng
10b4: yang rung / sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas shing gnas na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
10b5: pa 'di bka' stsal to/ / khyod kyis ma g.yengs yid byed kyis// rtag tu rgyal ba de dran zhing // rtag tu byams pa'i sems byos dang // khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur// gzhon nu 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs
10b6: rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu khri nyis stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
10b7: pa'i sangs rgyas dang po sems bskyed the tsom gcod mdzad nyon mongs bskyod ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ / gzhon nu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bya ba rtsom pa thams cad dang / 'greng yang
10b8: rung / 'dug kyang rung / 'chag kyang rung ste/ spyod lam thams cad du phyag 'tshal cig/ yid la byos shig dang / sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems bsgrubs shig dang / gzhon nu khyod la

11a1: 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / dgos pa thams cad kyang 'bad mi dgos par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// bya ba kun la nyin mtshan du//
11a2: sangs rgyas de ni dran bya zhing // byang chub sems kyang ma btang dang // khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur// gzhon nu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan
11a3: legs par bzung bar gyis shig/ / legs par bcang bar gyis shig/ legs par kun chub par gyis shig dang 'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba 'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad khyod la 'thung bar mi 'gyur ro// de skad ces
11a4: bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
11a5: rgyas de dag gi mtshan rnams bzung lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mun pa ma mchis shing / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs
11a6: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang dper na de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar 'khor rnams la chos ston pa bzhin du mthong ngo / / de nas 'khor de las shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal
11a7: la sogs pa skye bo phal po che'i tshegs bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i srog chags
11a8: stong tshang ba de dag thams cad stan las langs ste/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom

11b1: ldan 'das la 'di sad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi don gyi sang dra bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la rdzogs de dag dang 'jig na rje la
11b2: de dag kyang mun pa ma mchis par gda' la/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang dper na/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa 'di bzhin du gda'o// de nas
11b3: sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri 'bru stan las langs te/ bla gas zag bcig tu byas nas/ zas mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba bcud nas/
11b4: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan rnams thos nas mig
11b5: rnam par dag cing phyogs bcu dag na 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag mchis pade dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong ba de dag gi mig rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams de dag bcom ldan 'das
11b6: lags/ tshe rabs gzhan du tshe 'phos na yang 'bral bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am
11b7: rigs kyi bu mo gang dag 'di ltar mig rnam par dag pa de dag ni sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid tu 'gyur ro/ / shA ri'i bu khyod kyis srog chags stong tshad pa 'di mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bu 'di dag
11b8: thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis re res kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag byed du bcug nas srid pa tha ma dang / lus tha ma la byang chub kyi tshogs

12a1: thams cad rdzogs par byas te/ bskal pa gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan dag pas brgyan pa zhes bya bar mtshan mthun pa sha stag bla na med pa
12a2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de rnams lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di bka' stsal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
12a3: rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ / 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul// g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos// 'u ra 'ur rab tu bur/ kun tu rab tu'ur/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab
12a4: ru ldeg/ che ma che ma rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// sa bla'i lha rnams kyis kyang kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyis de bzhin
12a5: g shegs pa'i mtshan bzung ba tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bzung zhing chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas don thams cad thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs
12a6: par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar che ste/ / su zhig sangs rgyas la dad par mi 'gyur zhes smra bsgrags so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan
12a7: parnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdud kyi ris rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams nas 'og min gyi lha rnams
12a8: k yi bar gyis sa bla'i lha rnams kyi sgra de thos nas yi rangs shing rab tu dga' la dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas tshig 'di skad ces kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs

12b1: p a'i mtshan bzung ba tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bzung zhing chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas don thams cad thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba ni
12b2: ngo mtshar che ste/ su zhig sangs rgyas la dad par mi 'gyur zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par
12b3: zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par
12b4: byed pa dang / / than glegs bam la bris te 'chang bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin par rig par bya'o// de dag
12b5: la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar rig par bya'o/ / deg shes ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// de dag pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// de dag la chu dang / chom rkun dang / dug dang / mtshon gyis 'jigs pa/
12b6: mi 'byung bar yid ches par bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsrung ba lung bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di shes nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba'i phyir lha'i
12b7: bu stong tshad bas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
12b8: bskong ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang srog chags song tshang bapa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag la lha'i can dan gyi

13a1: bye ma dang / skab ma tag man dar ba dang / man dar bcan pa rnams byas mngan par gtar nas thal ma sbyar daphyags gcig du 'daganas 'dasad ces kyang gas te// bcom ldan 'das bdag gas
13a2: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / 'chang bar bgyid pa dang / klog par bgyid pa dang / kun chub par brgyad pa de dag bsrung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das
13a3: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag khyim na mchis sam/ dgon pa na mchis sam/ shing drung na mchis sam/ khyim stong pa na mchis sam/ 'brog dgon pa na mchis sam/ lam dang lam gol ba na mchis
13a4: sam/ gnyid log gam/ gnyid ma log pa dag na yang de dag la pha rol gyi gnod pas 'gum par mi 'gyur bar bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
13a5: bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gis ji srid
13a6: 'tsho bar du chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / snyun gyi rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed na/ kun dga' bo de tsam gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti byas par mi
13a7: 'gyur/ bla mar byas par mi 'gyur/ ri mor byas par mi 'gyur/ mchod pa byas par mi 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig chos kyi rna
13a8: grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin par byed dam/ 'chang bar byed dam/ klog par byed dam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang ma/ kun dag

13b1: bo de tsam gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti dam pa dang / bla mar bya ba dam pa dang / ri mong ba dang pa dang / mchod pa dam pas bkur sti byas pa yin no// bla mar byas pa yin/ ri mor byas pa yin/ mchod pa byas pa
13b2: yin no/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pacig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom
13b3: ldan 'das la 'di sad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di
13b4: skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kun dga' ba de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya bar zung shig/ di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya
13b5: ba dang / dngos po med par rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang / mtshan nyid med par rtogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa
13b6: shA ri'i bu dang / shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal dang srog chags stong tshang ba de dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / me dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas
13b7: pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho//
13b8: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud d+ha sir ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban de rtsangs de ben dra rak+Shi tas bsgyur / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa//

14a1: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sa pa ta bud d+ha ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
14a2: lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das tesa'i ri rtse mo lha'i gnas na drang srong gi spyod pa dang hacang yang me ring ba zhen na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub
14a3: sems dpa' lnga brgya la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / kun du bzang po dang / mtha' yas me tog dang / kur
14a4: nam me tog dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na dge slong zhig 'byung pos
14a5: zid nas brdol cing gcer bu gos med la lag pa bsgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug pa gzigs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas
14a6: pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyilan gyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa 'di dang /
14a7: dge slong gcer bu gos ma mchis pa lag pa stong pa gcig shos 'di yang su zhog lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
14a8: to/ / nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni nad kyis btab pa yin no// gcig shos 'di yang nad kyis btab pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad

14b1: ces gsol to/ / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs
14b2: rgyas sprul pa mdzad de/ de nas nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drag byung ngo // bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzegs steng gi
14b3: nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// nam
14b4: bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na moHsaM g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM hu lu hu lu/ hi li hi li ya/ na mo dzaka/ na pa sh+tsa nA ya/ na mo na ma swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzegs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
14b5: rin po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / dam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chu dang /
14b6: sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i rus byed par mi 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de drug zos kyang zas bzhin du 'gyur ro// zas dang skom la lan bdun bzlas brjod
14b7: byas te zos na pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / / nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro// ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong
14b8: par 'gyur ro/ / mtshon btab pa'i rnam par bzlas brjod byas la sna ma'i mar sbyin no// mdze dang skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la sna ma'i mar dang / uta pa la sngon po dang / shu ti dang / nye'u shing rnams

15a1: bsres pa'i mar byin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/ / las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can
15a2: thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/
15a3: patsa pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa/ pa ya sarba b+hU tanAM/ tshin d+ha ya kI la pa ra bid+ya nAM swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / bsgo mnyes pa dang / rmi lam
15a4: ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing / ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 'di zung shig/ nam mkha'i
15a5: snying po gdal la zhig de'i snying po 'di nyin lan gsum yid la byed na/ de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur
15a6: gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ / 'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de nas 'di'i cho ga gzhan ni nad thams cad la skud pas bcing bar
15a7: bya'o/ / 'dus pa las gyur pa la ni snga ma'i mar la bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no// chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o// srud pas bdag la bsrung ngo // byis pa rnams kyi gnon dag la sred pa sngon po gdags so//
15a8: mtshon btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o// gzhan dag la yang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams

15b1: cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa g+hA ya/ oM ka
15b2: la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ku lo ud sA d+ha nAM ku ru/ sarba gra ta nA~M sA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar
15b3: byung ba thams cad kyis gsungs shing / des kyang da ltar bshad pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig/ gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na/
15b4: de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ rims nad kyis mi 'debs shing chu dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te sngon gyi las
15b5: kyi sgrib pa ni ma gtogs so/ / dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge snyen ma gang la la zhig nang bar langs nas mgo bkrus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na
15b6: de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ / de la sems can sdang ba gang dag dang / rgyal po rnams thog mar smra bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad
15b7: kyi nang du yid la bya'o/ / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad la skud pa dkar po gdags so// mig nad la shing 'o ma can las skud pa byas te// rna ba las gdags so// dmag rengs
15b8: par byed par 'dod pas zho dang sbrang rtsi la sbags pa'i 'bras yos la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o/ / rA dza nan rA dza ma tri ma pA ba shI ka ra du kA ma ne/ 'o ma can gyi shing gi spar shing gis me bus la bsreg

16a1: bya til dag la lan stong sbyin bsreg bya'o/ / bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa byang zhing / dpal chen po dang / nor gyi phung po chen po bsgrub par 'dod na/ 'o ma can gyi shing gi
16a2: spar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin bsreg bya'o/ / sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad sbyang bar 'dod pa dang // rig sngags thams cad grub par 'dod pa dang / bdag bkru bar 'dod pas shu ti dang
16a3: na la da dang / khre dang / sha ri sha dang / rgya spos dang / kur ku mo dang / gla sgang dang / en dra ba ru na dang / byang chub kyi shing dang / a mra'i mgo lcogs dang 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin zhag
16a4: gcig sbyang bar bya zhing bum pa sar pa bzhag ste/ zla ba nya ba la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la khrus bya'o// dug mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas
16a5: kyi spyan sngar ser ldeng gi thur ma ba'i lci bar sprugs pa brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas smos te sbyin bsreg byas nas dug mi gdug par 'gyur ro/ / gdon bsrung ba dang / 'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la yang sbyar
16a6: bar byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa log par dngasal steng ge nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i
16a7: phyir dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ na maHkra ku ts+tsha na dA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te sa ma myag sam bud
16a8: d+hA ya/ oM ka Ta ka Ta/ ka tha ka Tha/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ki Thi ki wi/ ki tA ba ya nA ma sA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel ces bya ba gang

16b1: gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs shing rjes bu yi rang ba de'i snying pa 'di khyod kyis zung shig/ blangs shing bzung ste kun chub par byas na phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag de
16b2: tsha dkon mchog gsum la dad pa brnyes nas khrus byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dgags mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par gyur na/ tshe rabs
16b3: bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ / lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro// yang me rnams kyi nang du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// yang na cho ga bzhin sgrub na de mir skye ba tha ma thob
16b4: par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la yang rtag tu brjod na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// zas dang skom gyi
16b5: rnam pa la lan bdun bsngags te/ zos 'thungs na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// ji ste skom zhi bar 'dod na bza' ba thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya'o// lkog rgal gcod na zangs khab kyis
16b6: bya'o/ / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'ching ba thams cad las thar bar byan lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste/ rtag tu nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro// dziH
16b7: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na des phyogs gtsang mar mchod rten gyi 'khor sar dkyil 'khor bskus la/ a ga rus bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ de'i drung du sngas shar phyogs
16b8: su bstan te nyal na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / yid la ci smon babade thams cad ston to// tshe'am stobs sam pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub

17a1: steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ / sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang // nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka'
17a2: stsal to/ / na ma bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ na moHka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te sam myags ma bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sa ra sa ra sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri si ri si ri si ri ya/ d+ha ma d+ha maH
17a3: ma ya/ d+hu mad+h+ya ma d+h+ya me d+hu ma d+hu ma ya/ na mo nA ma ya ke nakamu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha ta sa ma myags ma bud d+hA ya/ swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
17a4: snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin cing rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / me dang / chu dang / lce 'bab pas 'chi ba'i dus
17a5: byed par mi 'gyur/ / dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// tshe ring bar 'gyur/ longs
17a6: spyong che bar 'gyur/ / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib par gyur pa thas
17a7: cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ / ci ste pha rol nad las thar bar byed 'dod na ci nus su gtor ma gtong zhing phog gam/ a ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs la gza' thams cad la khrus bya'o// mdza dang spangs nad dang mchin
17a8: sman la shu dag 'jam po btags pa sbrang rtsi dang bsres te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te bskus na mdza nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro// zhag bzhi pa la sangs

17b1: mas maldan nas na ra/ ma matag ga phreng ba la lan stang rdza brgyad bdags// ma'amag sa cangs nanags/ ba mamasas par 'gyur // mtshan tam pa'i na par bzlas pa bya na
17b2: brjed byed las thar bar 'gyur ro/ / lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis bdug go/ de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de/ las thams cad byed pa zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin
17b3: gshegs pa 'od srung steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag
17b4: bka' stsal to/ / na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+hA rmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ oM ha ra hA ra ha ra ha ra/ ha ha ha/ na maHkA sh+ya bA ya/ ta thA ga d+hA ya a ra ha te saM myA ga sa ma bud d+hA ya/ si d+hAn du man ta pa re swAhA/ de bzhin gshas
17b5: pa 'od srung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / nam mkha'i snying po snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung sum bcu rtsa
17b6: gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po snying po 'di khyod kyis zung shig kun chub par gyis shig/ gang la la zhig 'dzin ta ma/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ nyin mo 'am/
17b7: mtshan mo lan gsum gsum bzlas brjod byed na mdor na thal ma na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur te// sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so// las
17b8: thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ / mdze dang sha skra la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te blugs shing bkrus na sos par 'gyur ro// klan pa na

18a1: ba la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i metog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// thams cad du yang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/
18a2: gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud d+hA yA/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M b+hA ya/ tad+ya thA g+h+ra me g+hu me
18a3: b+hU me ma hA b+ha me/ ta la ta le mahA ta le/ tsa le tsa le ma hA tsa le/ d+hu re d+hu re many+dzad+ha re/ ti ri ti ri ma hA ti ri/ ki li ki li ma hA ki li/ tsu ru tsu ru ma hA tsu ru/ mi li me li ma hA ma li/ ti li ti le ma hA ti li/ d+hA me d+hu me mahA
18a4: d+hu pe/ tsa le tsa le ma hA tsa le/ khi ri khi ri ma hA khi ri/ tsi li tsi li ma hA tsi li swAhA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka
18a5: sras so/ / glad pa'i nad pasal na mtshon dang lag mthil gyis bya'o// sprin bzlog na shing kar bi ri'i lcug mas bya'o// drag sngon chus bya'o// las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o// khrus kyi tshogs sbyar bar bya'o// chogs
18a6: cad kyis thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
18a7: pal mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa sangs kyis bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// rdza gar u0f7fdadz+ra/ Ar+yA a shwa prad d+ha kan ma ma hA yAn swa u0f7f/ bodas nga/
18a8: 'phags pa sangs rgyas brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ga bdag gis thos pa dris gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ma

18b1: yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa
18b2: zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes
18b3: su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs
18b4: pa ni 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug
18b5: tug yos/ ma bkrol bar bar sdang las sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra dag kyang byung / lha'i me tog man dar ba dang / man dang ba chen po dang / man 'dzu sha ka dang / man 'dzu sha ka chen po'i me tog gi chang
18b6: yang bab ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba thams cad rin po che'i me tog gis tshal bas gang bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe/ de la thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong
18b7: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gser gyi kha tog snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ / de nas mod la shar phyogs nas pad ma sdong po ni gser/ 'dab ma ni dngul/ ze 'bru ni bai DUH/ snying po ni de'i snying po
18b8: las grub pa brgyad cig byung bar gyur to/ / pad ma'i snying po thams cad kyi steng na seng ge'i khri gru bzhi pa/ rtsa ba bzhi zug pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ dri dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ dar gyi lnga ldi sbyangs pa/

19a1: bog bor nas spos kyi dris shin tu bdugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs du ma dag gis legs par brgyan pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dum 'khrol ba/ rin po che du ma'i bla re bres pa dag byung bar gyur//
19a2: to// seng ge'i khri thams cad kyi steng na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag kyang bzhugs par yang snang ste/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog brnyes pa/ dul
19a3: ba dang zhi gnas dam pa brnyes pa/ dbang po bsrungs shing thul ba/ glang po shin tu dul ba lta bu/ mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med la gsal pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis sku
19a4: legs par brgyan pa/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i skus nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te bzhugs pa/ spyod lam brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/ sku mdog lta bas chog mi shes pa dag snang ngo //
19a5: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
19a6: btung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs nas pad ma sdong po ni gser/ 'dab ma ni dngul/ ze'u 'bru ni bai DUr+ya/ snying po ni rdo'i snying po las grub pa brgyad po 'di dag byur
19a7: bar gyur te pad ma'i snying po thams cad kyi steng na seng ge'i khri gru bzhi pa/ rtsu ba bzhi zug pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ dri dang ldan pa/ yid tu mchig dar gyi lda ldi spangs pa/ bog por nas spos kyi dris shin tu bdugs
19a8: ba/ rin po che sna tshogs du mas legs par brgyan pa/ dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba dum 'khrol ba/ rin po che du ma'i bla re bres pa dag byung bar gyur pa/ seng ge'i khri thams cad kyi steng na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag

19b1: bzhugs par yang gdung ste/ mdzes pa/ bstan sdug pa/ dbang po ni gzugs ni ga/ dul bdang ni gnas mchog brnyes pa/ rdul ba dang ni gnas dam pa brnyes pa/ dbang po bsrungs shing thal pa/ glang bam shin du dul ba/
19b2: lha bu mtsho ltar dang shing rtog pa mdal gsal ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sram bcwa rtsa gnyis po dag gis sgra legs par brgyan pa/ gseng kyi la dog lta bu'i skyes nyis dang zla ba'i gza brjid zil gyis mnanas bzhugs
19b3: pa/ spyod lam brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/ sku mdog blta bas chog mi shes pa dag gda' ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri 'a bu la 'di skad ces
19b4: bka' stsal to/ / shA ri'i bu khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyan la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan
19b5: 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal gyis mi khyab
19b6: pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu yongs bsgrags dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu
19b7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'od dga' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
19b8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ / shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su

20a1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma rnyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sdug dga' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin
20a2: tu rnam par gnon pa grags mchog dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ / shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bzhi'i
20a3: bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las shin tu rnam par rgyal ba'i rtsal
20a4: zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la tshes kyang ston to/ / shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
20a5: r nam dag brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan bkod pa'i dpal kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
20a6: kyang ston to/ / shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'gyur med ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
20a7: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal po dpal thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ / shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs
20a8: l ogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spobs pa brtsegs pa gang zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

20b1: sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad ma las rnam par gnon pas bzhud pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ / shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas
20b2: z hing gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye sa snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad ma la
20b3: tu gnas pas la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston to/ / shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag ni yongs su dag pa ste/ snyigs ma lnga med do//
20b4: ya mtshan can thams cad med do// gseg ma dang gyo mo dag med do// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med do// bud med med do// dud 'gro dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten yang med do// sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg pa
20b5: rnams med do/ / shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / kun chub par byed
20b6: pa de dag ngan song gsum du 'gro ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/ / shA ri'i bu de dag sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba de ni gnas med do// mtshams
20b7: med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag ni ma gtogs te/ de yang chung ngu myong zhing mang du myong bar mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
20b8: mtshan nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / kun chub par byed par de byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du nam yang mngon par shes pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam

21a1: yang mtshan dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang gzungs dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang sgra dbyangs shin tu rgyas pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang rnga sgra'i dbyangs
21a2: dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang sbyin gnas dang phyir mi ldog pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa dang
21a3: bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do// shA ri'i bu bud med gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang /
21a4: rab tu 'don pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de bud med kyi dngos po lan gnyis thob par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do// smon lam gyi dbang gis len pa ni ma gtogs so// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/
21a5: shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / kun chub par byed na rigs kyi bu 'am
21a6: rigs kyi bu mo de rgyal pos 'jigs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rkun pos sam/ mes sam/ chus sam/ ma rungs pas sam/ klus sam/ gnod sbyin gyis sam/ dri zas sam/ lha ma yin gyis sam/ mis sam/ mi ma
21a7: yin pas 'jigs par 'gyur ba 'am/ gang gis kyang glags rnyed par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do// las kyi rnam par smin pa drag po ni ma gtogs te/ de yang chung ngu myong zhing mang du myong bar mi 'gyur ro// de 'jig
21a8: rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel ba nyid du 'gyur gyi/ 'grib par mi 'gyur bar re bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su

21b1: bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / 'jig rten mgon po de dag gi/ mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa ni// mi khom thams cad yongs spangs nas// myur du bzang 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes
21b2: byas nas/ / ston pa de mthong dang byed cing // 'jig rten sgron ma mthong nas kyang // mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba grangs med tu// 'khor ba rnam par spong bar byed// gang gis 'dren rnams mthong //
21b3: 'gyur ba'i// dri med mig kyang rnam par spyod// 'jig rten mgon po de dag gi/ mtshan rnams su zhig 'dzin byed pa// de na gang dang gar skyes par// 'jig rten phyag bya'i 'os su 'gyur// de'i gzugs mtshan phun sum
21b4: tshogs/ / phyug po'i khyim du skye bar 'gyur// dpa' zhing sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur// ser sna med cing lkug par gtong// mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// bskal pa bye ba mang por na// lha'i tsan dan dmar po yi//
21b5: dri dang kha nas 'byung bar 'gyur// drang srong chen po de dag gi/ mtshan rnams bud med thos gyur na// bud med dngos po rnam spangs te// skyes bu mkhas par reng bar 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// pha dang ma
21b6: dang spun rnams dang / / mdza' bshes nye du'i tshogs rnams kyi// sdug bsngal nam yang mthong mi 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// de dang de dag 'jig rten na// mdab ma stong phrag bye ldan pa'i// rin chen pad mar skye bar/
21b7: 'gyur// mtshan nams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du// nam mkha' las ni 'gro byed cing // 'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas zhing // rnam par dag pa mthong bar 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po'i
21b8: drung dag tu/ / zab mo'i chos ni nyan byed cing // ji ltar thos pa chung mi gson// mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// de dag la ni sdig can bdud// nag po'i rtsa lag sder bcas pas// nam yang glagra rnyed mi 'gyur ro// mtshan

22a1: rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ / de dag mtshon gyis mi gsod cing // dug dang mes kyang ma yin la// rgyal po dang ni kun po yis// de dag gtso bar byed mi 'gyur// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lto 'byar
22a2: rnams kyis/ / glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas 'di dag mi mchog ste// dpal gyi snying po 'brug gi rgyal// 'dzangs pa bag yod gyur nas ni// mkhas mi su zhig mtshan mi 'dzin// 'jig rten mgon pa
22a3: thams cad kyi/ / mtshan rnams 'di dag su nyan pa// mi de dag ni tshogs nyan// grags ldan rnams kyi mtshan thos nas// de dag dpa' zhing shes rab che// 'jig rten mi mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis
22a4: de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
22a5: par bstod do/ / 'phags pa sangs rgyas brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ da sha bud d+ha nA ma ma hA ya nA su tra/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcu pa zhes bya ba theg
22a6: pa chen po'i mdo/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun
22a7: stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong phrag rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul yangs
22a8: pa'i li n+ya byi gzhon nu yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa stan las langs te/ bla gos

22b1: praphrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gangan ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te bdag cag gis
22b2: zhu ba zhus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rangs pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol
22b3: pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes/
22b4: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gang dang gang 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
22b5: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na da ltar bcom ldan
22b6: 'das bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston pa gang dag gi mtshan bzung na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba mchis sam/ de skad ces gsol pa
22b7: dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa legs so legs so// yon tan
22b8: rin chen me tog rgyas pa khyod 'di ltar 'dir lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / skye bo mang po rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse

23a1: ba'i phyir zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa khyod yang legs so// yon
23a2: tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
23a3: yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa shar phyogs logs na yon tan thams cad nam
23a4: bar dag pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan bskal pa dpag tu med pa las 'das pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te
23a5: 'tshol gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/ / bskal pa de ni thams cad nye bar bsags shing brtsegs pa zhes bya'o// de na sems can rnams kyi tshe yang dpag tu med do// bcom ldan 'das yon tan bskul pa dpag
23a6: ku med pa las 'das pa de'i 'khor thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
23a7: sangs rgyas yon tan bskal pa dpag tu med pa las 'das pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na bskal pa stong phrag drug bcur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed do/ / shi 'phos nas kyang sgrib pa med pa'i bzungs
23a8: shes bya ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang spobs pa yang dag par bskyed do// chos ston pa na yang khengs par mi 'gyur ro// de la

23b1: 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang gis skyob pa'i mtshan ni bzung byas na// de la byang chub dam pa rnyed bla zhing // bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan rnams dang // yon tan dri med 'di dag mis 'thob 'gyur// yon tan rin chen
23b2: me tog rgyas pa lho phyogs legs na yon tan rin chen bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen bkod pa'i
23b3: dpal gzi brjid kyi phung po'i bskal pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshal gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/ / bskal pa de ni yon tan rgya che ba zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa
23b4: d gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen yon tan bkod pa'i dpal gzi brjid kyi phung po'i bskal pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na shi 'phos nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyis mtha' klas pa zhes
23b5: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa dpag tu med pa nams yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du smon lam btab pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro// bla na
23b6: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs so/ / shi 'phos nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ khyab bdag mtshan 'di
23b7: sus bzung ba/ / mtha' klas pa yi ting nge 'dzin// 'odi ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can// mtshan rnams bcas te shi bas 'thob// yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa nub phyogs na sbyor bas mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes
23b8: bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal da ltar bzhugs te 'tshel gzhes shing chos

24a1: sa / ga ga ga ga sa
24a2: pa'i dpa nas bya ba de'i ma tshan bzang na mtshan pa dang / sa dang / wa dang / ga gis 'chi ba'i sa byud par smi ga shing rdza k+ta bar byung ba// shib po nas thugs pacwa pa nas
24a3: thob par 'gyur ro/ / de la 'di kad ces bya ste/ rgyal ba de yis tshan ni sras bzung ba/ me dang chud drug gis mi 'chi zhing // 'di la mtshan gyis mi rmugs mkhas pa dang // mngal du mi sta gzungs rnams mi sa
24a4: 'thob/ / yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa byang phyogs logs na mun pa dang tshul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par
24a5: sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshol gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/ / bskal pa de ni rin che ba zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
24a6: b u mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug
24a7: bcu mnyes par byed do/ / thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// sgyu ma lta bu las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// mi zad pa'i za ma tog ces
24a8: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su ma gyur gyi bar du ngan song gsum du mi skye zhing mi smod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skyes pa

24b1: de dang der sems can ngan song du song ba thams cad yongs su grol bar byed cing de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par byed do/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bde gshegs
24b2: de'i mtshan ni sras bzung ba/ / sems can mtha' yas byang chub bskyed pa dang // gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa dang // ngan 'gror skyebs 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa shar lhor
24b3: phyogs mtshams logs na yun ring por bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgra dbyangs stong
24b4: pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshal gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/ / bskal pa de ni yon tan 'byung ba zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
24b5: pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgra dbyangs stong pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na/ de shi 'phos nas so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi
24b6: rkang pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro/ / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'thob par 'gyur ro// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
24b7: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / bud med kyang shi 'phos nas skyes pa'i dngos po
24b8: 'thob cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang gis mtshan 'di dag ni bzung byas na// 'od dpag med 'dra'i zhing dag 'thob pa dang // bud med/

25a1: phor 'gyur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// yon tan 'di dang gzhan yang thob par 'gyur// yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa lce nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs na yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod
25a2: pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs kyis nyi ma'i 'od dam pa dpal gyi gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshol
25a3: gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/ / bskal pa de ni yid bde ba yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
25a4: sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od dam pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba de'i mtshan thos na mtshan de dag thos pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu mnyes par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad du mdangs lta bu zhes
25a5: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos mtshan de dag rgyun du bzung ba byas na shi 'phos nas sems can thams cad mdangs lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jog par byed
